doc.name: ArcAttribute
doc.description: This is an attribute that is rendered as an ellipse. Unlike the base class, by default, an ellipse is centered on its origin.
doc.author: Edward A. Lee
doc.property: The angular extent of the angle of the arc in degrees. This is a double that defaults to 90.0.
The starting angle of the arc in degrees. This is a double that defaults to 0.0.
The type of the arc, which should be one of "chord", "open", or "pie". The default is "pie".
